casebody.data:
Jose ZAVALA and Antoinette Zavala, Appellants-Plaintiffs,
v.
James POLING and the City of Crown Point, Indiana, Appellees-Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 45A03-1706-CT-1250 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED December 20, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

SHEPARD , Sr.J. Affirmed. RILEY, J., Concurs.

ROBB, J., Concurs.
